pkgmetadata.longdescription: Load ARCOS Prescription Data Prepared by the Washington Post // A wrapper for the 'ARCOS API' https://arcos- api.ext.nile.works/__swagger__/ that returns raw and summarized data frames from the Drug Enforcement Administrations Automation of Reports and Consolidated Orders System, a database that monitors controlled substances transactions between manufacturers and distributors which was made public by The Washington Post and The Charleston Gazette-Mail.
